ModMetaData.name: Giddy-Up 2
ModMetaData.author: Roolo, Owlchemist
ModMetaData.description: This is a renovated, overhauled fork of Giddy-Up, developed with permission from the original author Roolo. It's an all-in-one, containing all the modules in a single mod, internally modularized within the mod options. Giddy-Up allows pawns to ride animals around on the map, or even use them as battle mounts.
